metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8327 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in util.c in foomatic-rip incups-filters 1.0.42 before 1.2.0 and in foomatic-filters in Foomatic 4.0.xallows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via ` (backtick)characters in a print job.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8327` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

foomatic-filters - 4.0.17-7
No subscription required

cups-browsed - 1.2.0-1
cups-filters - 1.2.0-1
cups-filters-core-drivers - 1.2.0-1
libcupsfilters1 - 1.2.0-1
libfontembed1 - 1.2.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: foomatic-filters package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.17-7').
cups-filters package in esm-infra/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1').
